autumn.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler
autumn.translation[0].note_box[0].items[: in autumn/in the autumn
You use in autumn or in the autumn when saying that something happens at that time
In autumn the leaves turn red
She is planning to go back to college in the autumn
last autumn/this autumn etc

last autumn/this autumn etc
You say this autumn

last autumn/this autumn etc
You say next autumn

The novel will be published in next autumn
last autumn/this autumn etc
You say  that autumn
